response.overview: When the laws of the world fail to defend those who were wronged, it is up to Akta, the chosen one, to punish those who do evil. After punishing a man, she stumbles upon the man’s 12 year-old daughter, Ana, and decides to adopt Ana as her own. Some time passes, and Ana is still uncomfortable with Akta, until one day when Akta saves Ana from an accident. Ana becomes closer to Akta, but she suddenly remembered about what happened to her father causing Ana to be conflicted for being close to her father’s killer.
response.title: Akta
